instructions.de: Rechts halten an der Gabelung Richtung Destination 1
instructions.es: Mantente a la derecha hacia Destination 1
instructions.es-ES: Mantente a la derecha hacia Destination 1
instructions.fr: Tenir la droite en direction de Destination 1
instructions.id: Tetap di kanan pada pertigaan menuju Destination 1
instructions.it: Mantieni la destra al bivio verso Destination 1
instructions.ja: Destination 1へ向けて右車線を進む
instructions.my: Destination 1ဆီသို့ညာဘက်ကို ဆက်သွားပါ
instructions.pl: Na rozwidleniu trzymaj się prawej strony w kierunku Destination 1
instructions.pt-BR: Mantenha-se à direita na bifurcação sentido Destination 1
instructions.pt-PT: Mantenha-se à direita em direção a Destination 1
instructions.ro: Țineți pe dreapta la bifurcație spre Destination 1
instructions.ru: На развилке держитесь правее и продолжите движение в направлении Destination 1
instructions.sl: Držite se desno v smeri proti Destination 1
instructions.tr: Destination 1 istikametindeki yol ayrımında sağda kal
instructions.zh-Hans: 在岔道口保持右侧行驶，前往Destination 1
